entry.title: Do you study photography in college? cause you are sooooooooooooooo good at it.
entry.summary:
http://orlylol.tumblr.com/: Do you study photography in college? cause you are sooooooooooooooo good at it.

Haha, photography is just a hobby, so i haven’t actually taken any classes. I usually just get tips from friends and look through online photo blogs for inspiration.
